query:
INSERT INTO island_guides (
  name, slug, contentType, atoll, overview, quickFacts, 
  topThingsToDo, attractions, foodCafes, currency, language, 
  bestTimeToVisit, whatToPack, healthTips, emergencyContacts,
  threeDayItinerary, fiveDayItinerary, faq, heroImage, images,
  latitude, longitude, published, featured,
  nearbyAirports, nearbyDiveSites, nearbySurfSpots
) VALUES (
  'Fuvamulah Island',
  'fuvamulah-island',
  'island',
  'Gnaviyani Atoll',
  'Fuvamulah, a unique volcanic island in the southern Maldives, is a premier destination for thrill-seekers and nature lovers. Famous for its year-round tiger shark diving, distinctive white-pebble Thoondu Beach, and inland freshwater lakes, Fuvamulah offers an unparalleled adventure experience. The island combines world-class diving with cultural exploration and natural beauty.',
  JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('label', 'Best Time', 'value', 'Year-round (tiger sharks reliable)'),
    JSON_OBJECT('label', 'Currency', 'value', 'MVR, USD accepted'),
    JSON_OBJECT('label', 'Language', 'value', 'Dhivehi (English spoken)'),
    JSON_OBJECT('label', 'Coordinates', 'value', '3.2667, 73.5167'),
    JSON_OBJECT('label', 'Atoll', 'value', 'Gnaviyani'),
    JSON_OBJECT('label', 'Population', 'value', '~9,000'),
    JSON_OBJECT('label', 'Distance from Mal√©', 'value', '270 km south'),
    JSON_OBJECT('label', 'Famous For', 'value', 'Tiger shark diving')
  ),
  JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Dive with Tiger Sharks', 'description', 'Fuvamulah is the world\'s premier destination for diving with tiger sharks. Experience consistent sightings of tiger sharks, thresher sharks, and other pelagic species year-round.', 'icon', 'ü¶à'),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Visit Thoondu Beach', 'description', 'Relax on the island\'s most famous iconic shoreline, known for its unique white polished pebbles and excellent surfing/skimboarding conditions.', 'icon', 'üèñÔ∏è'),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Explore Fuvamulah Nature Park', 'description', 'Located at Dhadimagi Kilhi Lake, this area offers boardwalks, birdwatching, canoeing, and exploration of freshwater ecosystems.', 'icon', 'üå≥'),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Bike Around the Island', 'description', 'Rent a bicycle to explore the lush tropical island, visiting spots like Bandaara Kilhi (local lake) and discovering hidden beaches.', 'icon', 'üö¥'),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Discover Cultural Landmarks', 'description', 'Visit Vasho Veyo (ancient hand-crafted coral stone path) and Hiyavithi (ruins of an ancient Buddhist stupa) to experience local history.', 'icon', 'üèõÔ∏è'),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Swim at Koda Kilhi', 'description', 'Experience the natural, relaxing, and often muddy freshwater lake surrounded by lush vegetation - a unique Maldivian experience.', 'icon', 'üèûÔ∏è'),
    JSON_OBJECT('title', 'Try Local Food', 'description', 'Visit F & A Bakery or local caf√©s to experience authentic Maldivian cuisine in a quiet, island setting away from resort areas.', 'icon', 'üçΩÔ∏è')
  ),
  JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Vasho Veyo', 'description', 'Ancient hand-crafted coral stone path'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Hiyavithi', 'description', 'Ruins of an ancient Buddhist stupa'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Dhadimagi Kilhi Lake', 'description', 'Freshwater lake with nature park'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Bandaara Kilhi', 'description', 'Local freshwater lake for swimming'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Thoondu Beach', 'description', 'Iconic white pebble beach')
  ),
  JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'F & A Bakery', 'type', 'Bakery & Caf√©', 'description', 'Local bakery and caf√© for Maldivian cuisine'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Local Island Caf√©s', 'type', 'Caf√©', 'description', 'Various local caf√©s serving traditional food')
  ),
  'MVR',
  'Dhivehi (English spoken)',
  'Year-round (tiger sharks reliable throughout the year)',
  JSON_ARRAY('Diving gear (if not provided)', 'Light clothing', 'Sun protection', 'Reef shoes', 'Camera/GoPro', 'Insect repellent', 'Medications'),
  JSON_ARRAY('Malaria precautions recommended', 'Dengue fever risk - use mosquito protection', 'Ensure vaccinations up to date', 'Travel insurance recommended'),
  JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Fuvamulah Hospital', 'phone', '+960 682-0066'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Police', 'phone', '119'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Ambulance', 'phone', '102')
  ),
  JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('day', 'Day 1', 'activities', JSON_ARRAY('Arrive at Fuvamulah', 'Check-in and rest', 'Evening: explore local area')),
    JSON_OBJECT('day', 'Day 2', 'activities', JSON_ARRAY('Tiger shark diving trip', 'Lunch at local caf√©', 'Visit Thoondu Beach')),
    JSON_OBJECT('day', 'Day 3', 'activities', JSON_ARRAY('Explore Fuvamulah Nature Park', 'Bike around the island', 'Visit cultural landmarks'))
  ),
  JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('day', 'Day 1', 'activities', JSON_ARRAY('Arrive and settle in', 'Evening island orientation')),
    JSON_OBJECT('day', 'Day 2', 'activities', JSON_ARRAY('Tiger shark diving', 'Thoondu Beach visit')),
    JSON_OBJECT('day', 'Day 3', 'activities', JSON_ARRAY('Nature park exploration', 'Cycling tour')),
    JSON_OBJECT('day', 'Day 4', 'activities', JSON_ARRAY('Cultural landmark visits', 'Freshwater lake swimming')),
    JSON_OBJECT('day', 'Day 5', 'activities', JSON_ARRAY('Relaxation day', 'Local food experiences', 'Departure'))
  ),
  JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('question', 'Is Fuvamulah safe for diving?', 'answer', 'Yes, Fuvamulah is one of the safest diving destinations in the world for tiger shark diving. Dive operators are highly experienced and follow strict safety protocols.'),
    JSON_OBJECT('question', 'What is the best time to see tiger sharks?', 'answer', 'Tiger sharks can be seen year-round at Fuvamulah, making it unique. However, they are most active during certain seasons.'),
    JSON_OBJECT('question', 'Can I visit without diving?', 'answer', 'Absolutely! Fuvamulah offers excellent beaches, nature exploration, cycling, cultural sites, and local food experiences for non-divers.'),
    JSON_OBJECT('question', 'How do I get to Fuvamulah?', 'answer', 'Fly to Mal√© International Airport, then take a domestic flight to Fuvamulah Airport (about 1 hour flight).'),
    JSON_OBJECT('question', 'Is there accommodation on the island?', 'answer', 'Yes, Fuvamulah has guesthouses and local accommodations. It\'s a local island, not a resort destination.')
  ),
  'https://via.placeholder.com/800x600?text=Fuvamulah+Island',
  JSON_ARRAY(
    'https://via.placeholder.com/400x300?text=Tiger+Shark+Diving',
    'https://via.placeholder.com/400x300?text=Thoondu+Beach',
    'https://via.placeholder.com/400x300?text=Nature+Park',
    'https://via.placeholder.com/400x300?text=Local+Culture'
  ),
  '3.2667',
  '73.5167',
  1,
  1,
  JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Fuvamulah Airport', 'iataCode', 'GAN', 'distance', 'On island'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Mal√© International Airport', 'iataCode', 'MLE', 'distance', '1 hour domestic flight')
  ),
  JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Tiger Shark Alley', 'difficulty', 'Advanced', 'distance', '5-10 min boat'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Fuvamulah Thila', 'difficulty', 'Intermediate', 'distance', '15 min boat'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Shark Point', 'difficulty', 'Advanced', 'distance', '20 min boat')
  ),
  JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Thoondu Beach', 'difficulty', 'Beginner', 'distance', 'On island'),
    JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Fuvamulah Reef Break', 'difficulty', 'Intermediate', 'distance', 'On island')
  )
);
